May 14, 12:48 UTC

Root cause : Incident due to a connectivity issue on our infrastructure.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Our teams are keeping the incident under surveillance throughout the morning.

May 13, 08:40 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 13/05/2024 02:26 UTC
Service impact : Our spanish subscribers can make calls but they can not receive calls.
